nodes.text: Phol was a Human male who worked on Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Weavemaster Phol had a shop in the Anchorhead market, where he sold synthetic fabrics and clothing.

Phol was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. He appears in Anchorhead, the Republic-only city on Tatooine, as a Synthweaving Crew Skill Trainer.
